   19: 
   20: -module(sigils_SUITE).
   21: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   22: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([compiled_sigils/1, scan_sigils/1, parse_sigils/1]).
   26: 
   27: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   28: 
   29: all() ->
   30:     [compiled_sigils, scan_sigils, parse_sigils].
   31: 
   32: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   33:     Config.
   34: %%
   35: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   36:     ok.
   37: 
   38: groups() -> [].
   39: %%
   40: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   41:     Config.
   42: %%
   43: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   44:     Config.
   45: 
   46: 
   47: suite() ->
   48:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   49:      {timetrap,{seconds,30}}].
   50: %%
   51: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   52:     Config.
   53: %%
   54: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   55:     ok.
   56: 
   57: %% #########################################################################
   58: 
   59: compiled_sigils(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   60:     <<"<{[(/`#'|\"\\)]}>»"/utf8>> =
   61:         ~b"""
   62:         <{[(/`#'|\"\\)]}>»
   63:         """ =
   64:         ~"""
   65:         <{[(/`#'|"\)]}>»
   66:         """ =
   67:         ~B"""
   68:         <{[(/`#'|"\)]}>»
   69:         """,
   70:     <<"<{[(/`#'|\"\\)]}»"/utf8>> = % >
   71:         ~b<<{[(/`#'|"\\)]}»> =
   72:         ~B<<{[(/`#'|"\)]}»>,
   73:     <<"<{[(/`#'|\"\\)]>»"/utf8>> = % }
   74:         ~b{<{[(/`#'|"\\)]>»} =
   75:         ~B{<{[(/`#'|"\)]>»},
   76:     <<"<{[(/`#'|\"\\)}>»"/utf8>> = % ]
   77:         ~b[<{[(/`#'|"\\)}>»] =
   78:         ~B[<{[(/`#'|"\)}>»],
   79:     <<"<{[(/`#'|\"\\]}>»"/utf8>> = % )
   80:         ~b(<{[(/`#'|"\\]}>») =
   81:         ~B(<{[(/`#'|"\]}>»),
   82:     <<"<{[(`#'|\"\\)]}>»"/utf8>> = % /
   83:         ~b/<{[(`#'|"\\)]}>»/ =
   84:         ~B/<{[(`#'|"\)]}>»/,
   85:     <<"<{[(/#'|\"\\)]}>"/utf8>> = % `
   86:         ~b`<{[(/#'|"\\)]}>` =
   87:         ~B`<{[(/#'|"\)]}>`,
   88:     <<"<{[(/`|'\"\\)]}>»"/utf8>> = % #
   89:         ~b#<{[(/`|'"\\)]}>»# =
   90:         ~B#<{[(/`|'"\)]}>»#,
   91:     <<"<{[(/#|\"\\)]}>»"/utf8>> = % '
   92:         ~b'<{[(/#|"\\)]}>»' =
   93:         ~B'<{[(/#|"\)]}>»',
   94:     <<"<{[(/#'\"\\)]}>»"/utf8>> = % |
   95:         ~b|<{[(/#'"\\)]}>»| =
   96:         ~B|<{[(/#'"\)]}>»|,
   97:     <<"<{[(/#'|\\)]}>»"/utf8>> = % "
   98:         ~b"<{[(/#'|\\)]}>»" =
   99:         ~B"<{[(/#'|\)]}>»",
  100:     %%
  101:     "<{[(/`#'|\"\\)]}>»" =
  102:         ~s"""
  103:         <{[(/`#'|\"\\)]}>»
  104:         """ =
  105:         ~S"""
  106:         <{[(/`#'|"\)]}>»
  107:         """,
  108:     "<{[(/`#'|\"\\)]}»" = % >
  109:         ~s<<{[(/`#'|"\\)]}»> =
  110:         ~S<<{[(/`#'|"\)]}»>,
  111:     "<{[(/`#'|\"\\)]>»" = % }
  112:         ~s{<{[(/`#'|"\\)]>»} =
  113:         ~S{<{[(/`#'|"\)]>»},
  114:     "<{[(/`#'|\"\\)}>»" = % ]
  115:         ~s[<{[(/`#'|"\\)}>»] =
  116:         ~S[<{[(/`#'|"\)}>»],
  117:     "<{[(/`#'|\"\\]}>»" = % )
  118:         ~s(<{[(/`#'|"\\]}>») =
  119:         ~S(<{[(/`#'|"\]}>»),
  120:     "<{[(`#'|\"\\)]}>»" = % /
  121:         ~s/<{[(`#'|"\\)]}>»/ =
  122:         ~S/<{[(`#'|"\)]}>»/,
  123:     "<{[(/#'|\"\\)]}>" = % `
  124:         ~s`<{[(/#'|"\\)]}>` =
  125:         ~S`<{[(/#'|"\)]}>`,
  126:     "<{[(/`|'\"\\)]}>»" = % #
  127:         ~s#<{[(/`|'"\\)]}>»# =
  128:         ~S#<{[(/`|'"\)]}>»#,
  129:     "<{[(/#|\"\\)]}>»" = % '
  130:         ~s'<{[(/#|"\\)]}>»' =
  131:         ~S'<{[(/#|"\)]}>»',
  132:     "<{[(/#'\"\\)]}>»" = % |
  133:         ~s|<{[(/#'"\\)]}>»| =
  134:         ~S|<{[(/#'"\)]}>»|,
  135:     "<{[(/#'|\\)]}>»" = % "
  136:         ~s"<{[(/#'|\\)]}>»" =
  137:         ~S"<{[(/#'|\)]}>»",
  138:     %%
  139:     Pound = 16#A3,
  140:     Euro = 16#20AC,
  141:     [Pound,Pound,Euro,Euro] = ~s[£\xA3€\x{20AC}],
  142:     [Pound,$\\,$x,$A,$3,Euro,$\\|"x{20AC}"] = ~S[£\xA3€\x{20AC}],
  143:     <<"££€€"/utf8>> = ~b[£\xA3€\x{20AC}],
  144:     <<"£\\xA3€\\x{20AC}"/utf8>> = ~B[£\xA3€\x{20AC}],
  145:     %%
  146:     case "abc" of
  147:         ~s"abc" -> ok
  148:     end,
  149:     (fun (~B"abc") -> ok end)(<<"abc"/utf8>>),
  150:     ok.
  151: 
  152: %% #########################################################################
  153: 
  154: scan_sigils(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  155:     [begin
  156:         {S,_,_,What,Head} = Spec,
  157:          P1 = pos(element(2, Spec)),
  158:          P2 = pos(element(3, Spec)),
  159:          {_, {error,{P1,erl_scan,{unterminated,What,Head}},P2}} =
  160:              {Spec, erl_scan:string(S, {1,1}, [])}
  161:      end ||
  162:         Spec <-
  163:             [{"\"",2,2,string,""},
  164:              {"\"x",2,3,string,"x"},
  165:              {"\"\"\"",4,4,{string,3},""},
  166:              {"\"\"\"\n",4,{2,1},{string,3},"\n"},
  167:              {"~(",3,3,{sigil,'',$(,$)},""},
  168:              {"~[",3,3,{sigil,'',$[,$]},""},
  169:              {"~{",3,3,{sigil,'',${,$}},""},
  170:              {"~<",3,3,{sigil,'',$<,$>},""},
  171:              {"~`",3,3,{sigil,'',$`,$`},""},
  172:              {"~\"\"\"\"",6,6,{sigil,'',4},""},
  173:              {"~\"\"\"\"\n",6,{2,1},{sigil,'',4},"\n"},
  174:              {"~s/",4,4,{sigil,'s',$/,$/},""},
  175:              {"~s|x",4,5,{sigil,'s',$|,$|},"x"},
  176:              {"~s\"\"\"",6,6,{sigil,'s',3},""},
  177:              {"~s\"\"\"\n",6,{2,1},{sigil,'s',3},"\n"},
  178:              {"~S'",4,4,{sigil,'S',$',$'},""},
  179:              {"~S#x",4,5,{sigil,'S',$#,$#},"x"},
  180:              {"~S\"\"\"",6,6,{sigil,'S',3},""},
  181:              {"~S\"\"\"\nxx",6,{2,3},{sigil,'S',3},"\nxx"}]],
  182:     [begin
  183:         {S,_,_} = Spec,
  184:          P1 = pos(element(2, Spec)),
  185:          P2 = pos(element(3, Spec)),
  186:          {_, {error,{P1,erl_scan,{illegal,string}},P2}} =
  187:              {Spec, erl_scan:string(S, {1,1}, [])}
  188:      end ||
  189:         Spec <-
  190:             [{"~",2,2}, {"~ ",2,2}, {"~_",3,3}, {"~_ ",3,3}]],
  191:     %%
  192:     AtomSize = 255,
  193:     IllegalAtomString = lists:duplicate(AtomSize+1, $a),
  194:     EndPos1 = 2+AtomSize+1,
  195:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,sigil_prefix}},{1,EndPos1}} =
  196:         erl_scan:string("~"++IllegalAtomString, {1,1}, []),
  197:     EndPos2 = 4+AtomSize+1,
  198:     {error,{{1,4},erl_scan,{illegal,sigil_suffix}},{1,EndPos2}} =
  199:         erl_scan:string("~\"\""++IllegalAtomString, {1,1}, []),
  200:     ok.
  201: 
  202: 
  203: pos({R,C} = Pos) when is_integer(R), is_integer(C) -> Pos;
  204: pos(C) when is_integer(C) -> {1,C}.
  205: 
  206: %% #########################################################################
  207: 
  208: parse_sigils(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  209:     {ok, <<"ab\"c\d"/utf8>>, {1,12}} =
  210:         parse_term(
  211:           """
  212:           ~"ab\"c\d".
  213:           """),
  214:     %%
  215:     IllegalPrefix = "illegal sigil prefix",
  216:     IllegalSuffix = "illegal sigil suffix",
  217:     AllSigils = [" ~","~s","~S","~b","~B"],
  218:     [{_, {error,{1,1},erl_parse,IllegalPrefix,{2,5}}} =
  219:          {String, parse_term("~_"++String)}
  220:      || String <-
  221:             [""""
  222:              "
  223:                 "
  224:              """",
  225:              """"
  226:              """
  227:               """
  228:              """"]],
  229:     %%
  230:     [{_, {error,{1,8},erl_parse,IllegalSuffix,{1,9}}} =
  231:          {Prefix, parse_term(Prefix++"\"abc\"x")}
  232:      || Prefix <- AllSigils],
  233:     %%
  234:     [{_, {error,{3,6},erl_parse,IllegalSuffix,{3,7}}} =
  235:          {Prefix,
  236:           parse_term(
  237:             Prefix++""""
  238:                 """
  239:                   abc
  240:                   """x
  241:                 """")}
  242:      || Prefix <- AllSigils],
  243:     %%
  244:     [{_, {error,{3,7},erl_parse,"syntax error before: \"\"",{3,9}}} =
  245:          {Prefix,
  246:           parse_term(
  247:             Prefix++""""
  248:                 """
  249:                   abc
  250:                   """ ""
  251:                 """")}
  252:      || Prefix <- AllSigils],
  253:     %%
  254:     [{_, {error,{{3,6},erl_scan,string_concat},{3,6}}} =
  255:          {Prefix,
  256:           erl_scan:string(
  257:             Prefix++"""""
  258:                 """
  259:                   abc
  260:                   """"
  261:                 """"", {1,1}, [])}
  262:      || Prefix <- AllSigils],
  263:     [{_, {error,{{1,8},erl_scan,string_concat},{1,8}}} =
  264:          {Prefix,
  265:           erl_scan:string(
  266:             Prefix++"""
  267:                 "abc""
  268:                 """,
  269:             {1,1}, [])}
  270:      || Prefix <- AllSigils],
  271:     ok.
  272: 
  273: parse_term(String) ->
  274:     {ok,Tokens,EndPos} = erl_scan:string(String, {1,1}, []),
  275:     case erl_parse:parse_term(Tokens) of
  276:         {ok, Parsed} ->
  277:             {ok, Parsed, EndPos};
  278:         {error, {Pos,Mod,Str}} ->
  279:             {error, Pos, Mod, lists:flatten(Str), EndPos}
  280:     end.
